name: Period
description: Description for stochastic process with sampling at certain period.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: name of the time period as seen in SIMA.

attributes.name: period
attributes.description: place holder identification for the time period e.g. Year, Jan

attributes.name: wave
attributes.description: models for statistical representation of wave, e.g. omni, or 12sec.

attributes.name: wind
attributes.description: models for statistical representation of wind, e.g. omni, or 12sec.

attributes.name: current
attributes.description: models for statistical representation of current, e.g. omni, or 12sec.
